PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-12022024-11-08INFC
ActBridge To Strengthen Trade Act
SubjectOrder approving an exemption relieving the application of sections 4 and 5 of the Brigdes Act to the Windsor Detroit Bridge Authority and related works
PrecisOrder approving an exemption for the WINDSOR-DETROIT BRIDGE AUTHORITY from certain requirements under the authorization process set out in sections 4 and 5 of the BRIDGE ACT with respect to the construction of the international bridge across the Detroit River between Windsor, Ontario and Detroit, Michigan and related works.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order approving an exemption for the WINDSOR-DETROIT BRIDGE AUTHORITY from certain requirements under the authorization process set out in sections 4 and 5 of the BRIDGE ACT with respect to the construction of the international bridge across the Detroit River between Windsor, Ontario and Detroit, Michigan and related works.
